name: Ext_R4B_Encounter_di_condition
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Encounter.diagnosis.condition for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.diagnosis.condition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter
element.definition: Reason the encounter takes place, as specified using information from another resource. For admissions, this is the admission diagnosis. The indication will typically be a Condition (with other resources referenced in the evidence.detail), or a Procedure.
element.comment: `Encounter.diagnosis.condition` maps to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.condition`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
